timeline.message:
Updates issue templates

Reformatted issue template and added feature request template to point to new feature repository.

Signed-off-by: Mark E. Schill <Mark.Schill@cmschill.net>

timeline.author: ravenbuilder934
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,38 +1,47 @@
-# Before reporting please make sure that this issue was not reported yet (Check out similar issue suggestions).
-## Also update to the latest alpha of both minecolonies and structurize before reporting
+# Prerequisites
 
-<!-- If you are making a bug report, please fill out this template as best as possible, this will help 
+- [ ] I am running the lastest version of Minecolonies for my minecraft version.
+- [ ] I checked the Minecolonies [Wiki](https://ldtteam.github.io/MinecoloniesWiki/) and made sure that my issue is not covered by any content.
+- [ ] I checked and made sure that **this issue is not already covered by any existing issue**.
+- [ ] This is an issue and not a feature request. Please create all feature requests at [Minecolonies-features](https://github.com/ldtteam/minecolonies-features/issues).
+
+<!-- If you are making a bug report, please fill out this template as best as possible, this will help
      us to understand your issue much easier. -->
 
+### Context
+
 <!-- Exact version, eg: 0.9.126-ALPHA or 0.9.2-RELEASE, please don't just give the Minecraft version you're playing.
 Before reporting: Update to the newest minecolonies alpha and see if your issue might be fixed already.
 -->
 
-Version: 
+- Minecraft Version:
+- Minecolonies Version:
+- Related mods & Versions:

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            Feature requests for Minecolonies are located in the [minecolonies-feature](https://github.com/ldtteam/minecolonies-features/issues) repository. Please cancel this request and generate the request in that repository.
          
          
            
            Feature requests for MineColonies are located [here](https://github.com/ldtteam/minecolonies-features/issues). Please cancel this issue creation and create an issue in that repository.
timeline.author: ravenbuilder934
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,3 @@
+# Notice
+
+Feature requests for Minecolonies are located in the [minecolonies-feature](https://github.com/ldtteam/minecolonies-features/issues) repository. Please cancel this request and generate the request in that repository.
